resources.string:
Metronome App
Created with ‚ù§Ô∏è using Java and Android Studio.
Greetings and opinion are welcomed 
üìß deemmel@gmail.com

The App visualizes the 4-by-4 rhythm to perform rhythmic movements. Just tap on the screen and start exercising!

 Use the slider to speed up or slow down the tempo.

 The "Switch" menu point will allow to switch the fast tempo to the main or additional line of the image.
